summary: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.
cast: Roddy McDowall|Kim Hunter|Bradford Dillman|Natalie Trundy|Eric Braeden|William Windom|Sal Mineo|Albert Salmi|Jason Evers|John Randolph|Harry Lauter|M. title: Huida del planeta de los simios
